DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy dose-dependency 5-aminolevulinic acid subject iron deficiency anemia .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal woman hemoglobin ≥ 9.0 g/dl ≤ 12.0 g/dl Willing donate blood study Informed consent sign History porphyria , hemochromatosis , viral hepatitis Anemia iron deficiency BMI ≤ 18 kg/m2 ≥ 30 kg/m2 Pregnant nursing child Participation clinical trial within 90 day commencement trial Renal hepatic dysfunction Heart disease Subjects take medicine functional food may affect hemoglobin level
